name: Static (itch) (senneweiss)
description:
This game is made for the Vimjam.
Theme: there and back
Limitation: collectables

This game is a 2D platformer with a tv theme.
Can you help Henry and save the world from all the evil Professor Static unleashed?

*There is a small bug where you get teleported to the next level without talking to Henry, fixing that atm
